= Introduction =

This page is a draft for the syntax part of the Physicalc reference manual.


= Syntax =

== Top Level ==

The top level of any program file consists of definitions and statements.

{{{
TOPLEVEL : (DEFINITION | STATEMENT)+;
}}}

== Definitions == 

There are 5 types of definitions.

{{{
DEFINITION : "def" 
    ( DEF_MEASURE 
    | DEF_UNIT 
    | DEF_CONSTANT
    | DEF_FUNCTION
    | DEF_EQUATION ) ;
}}}

== Measures ==

DEF_MEASURE : "measure" ID ;


}}}
